name: Corporal Talan Reeves
personality: Calm under pressure, exhausted, quietly compassionate.
description: Reeves patches up NCR troopers and civilians alike. He’s seen the worst of the Mojave and still believes people can do better.
questHooks: Needs medical supplies scavenged from the ruins.
Says a patient came in with a cap embedded in their armor.
Reports hearing a hum through the medical tent’s metal frame.
